00013 void MakeClosestEnemyChosenOne()
00014 {
00015       UINT32                        cnt;
00016       INT16                         sPathCost, sShortestPath = 1000;
00017       INT8                          bOldKeys = -1;
00018       UINT8                         ubClosestEnemy = NOBODY;
00019       SOLDIERTYPE *     pSoldier;
00020       INT8                          bPanicTrigger;
00021       INT16                         sPanicTriggerGridNo;
00022 
00023       if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags & PANIC_TRIGGERS_HERE) )
00024       {
00025 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00026             PopMessage("MakeClosestEnemyChosenOne: ERROR - Panic Trigger is NOWHERE");
00027 #endif
00028 
00029             return;
00030       }
00031 
00032       if (!NeedToRadioAboutPanicTrigger() )
00033       {
00034             // no active panic triggers
00035             return;
00036       }
00037 
00038       // consider every enemy, looking for the closest capable, unbusy one
00039       for (cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++)
00040       {
00041             pSoldier = MercSlots[cnt];
00042 
00043             if (!pSoldier)    // if this merc is inactive, or not here
00044             {
00045                   continue;
00046             }
00047 
00048             // if this merc is unconscious, or dead
00049             if (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE)
00050             {
00051                   continue;  // next soldier
00052             }
00053 
00054             // if this guy's too tired to go
00055             if (pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH)
00056             {
00057                   continue;  // next soldier
00058             }
00059 
00060             if ( gWorldSectorX == TIXA_SECTOR_X && gWorldSectorY == TIXA_SECTOR_Y )
00061             {
00062                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != WARDEN )
00063                   {
00064                         continue;
00065                   }
00066             }
00067             else
00068             {
00069                   // only consider for army guys
00070                   if (pSoldier->bTeam != ENEMY_TEAM )
00071                   {
00072                         continue;
00073                   }
00074             }
00075 
00076             // if this guy is in battle with opponent(s)
00077             if (pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0)
00078             {
00079                   continue;  // next soldier
00080             }
00081 
00082             // if this guy is still in serious shock
00083             if (pSoldier->bShock > 2)
00084             {
00085                   continue;  // next soldier
00086             }
00087 
00088             if ( pSoldier->bLevel != 0 )
00089             {
00090                   // screw having guys on the roof go for panic triggers!
00091                   continue;  // next soldier
00092             }
00093 
00094             bPanicTrigger = ClosestPanicTrigger( pSoldier );
00095             if (bPanicTrigger == -1)
00096             {
00097                   continue; // next soldier
00098             }
00099 
00100             sPanicTriggerGridNo = gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bPanicTrigger ];
00101             if (sPanicTriggerGridNo == NOWHERE)
00102             {
00103                   // this should never happen!
00104                   continue;
00105             }
00106 
00107             // remember whether this guy had keys before
00108             //bOldKeys = pSoldier->bHasKeys;
00109 
00110             // give him keys to see if with them he can get to the panic trigger
00111             pSoldier->bHasKeys = (pSoldier->bHasKeys << 1) | 1;
00112 
00113             // we now path directly to the panic trigger
00114 
00115             
00116                   // if he can't get to a spot where he could get at the panic trigger
00117                   /*
00118                   if ( FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridno, &ubDirection, &sAdjSpot, FALSE, FALSE ) == -1 )
00119                   {
00120                         pSoldier->bHasKeys = bOldKeys;
00121                         continue;          // next merc
00122                   }
00123                   */
00124 
00125 
00126             // ok, this enemy appears to be eligible
00127 
00128             // FindAdjacentGrid set HandGrid for us.  If we aren't at that spot already
00129             if (pSoldier->sGridNo != sPanicTriggerGridNo)
00130             {
00131                   // get the AP cost for this enemy to go to target position
00132                   sPathCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sPanicTriggerGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, WALKING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
00133             }
00134             else
00135             {
00136                   sPathCost = 0;
00137             }
00138 
00139             // set his keys value back to what it was before this hack
00140             pSoldier->bHasKeys = (pSoldier->bHasKeys >> 1 );
00141 
00142             // if he can get there (or is already there!)
00143             if (sPathCost || (pSoldier->sGridNo == sPanicTriggerGridNo))
00144             {
00145                   if (sPathCost < sShortestPath)
00146                   {
00147                         sShortestPath = sPathCost;
00148                         ubClosestEnemy = pSoldier->ubID;
00149                   }
00150             }
00151             //else
00152             //NameMessage(pSoldier,"can't get there...");
00153       }
00154 
00155       // if we found have an eligible enemy, make him our "chosen one"
00156       if (ubClosestEnemy < NOBODY)
00157       {
00158             gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = ubClosestEnemy;       // flag him as the chosen one
00159 
00160 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00161             NumMessage("TEST MSG: The chosen one is ",TheChosenOne);
00162 #endif
00163 
00164             pSoldier = MercPtrs[gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne];
00165             if ( pSoldier->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED )
00166             {
00167                   pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
00168                   CheckForChangingOrders( pSoldier );
00169             }
00170             SetNewSituation( pSoldier );    // set new situation for the chosen one
00171             pSoldier->bHasKeys = (pSoldier->bHasKeys << 1) | 1; // cheat and give him keys to every door
00172             //pSoldier->bHasKeys = TRUE;         
00173       }
00174 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00175       else
00176             PopMessage("TEST MSG: Couldn't find anyone eligible to become TheChosenOne!");
00177 #endif
00178 }
00179 
00180 void PossiblyMakeThisEnemyChosenOne( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00181 {
00182       INT32       iAPCost, iPathCost;
00183       //INT8            bOldKeys;
00184       INT8        bPanicTrigger;
00185       INT16       sPanicTriggerGridNo;
00186       UINT32      uiPercentEnemiesKilled;
00187 
00188       if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags & PANIC_TRIGGERS_HERE) )
00189       {
00190             return;
00191       }
00192 
00193       if ( pSoldier->bLevel != 0 )
00194       {
00195             // screw having guys on the roof go for panic triggers!
00196             return;
00197       }
00198 
00199 
00200       bPanicTrigger = ClosestPanicTrigger( pSoldier );
00201       if (bPanicTrigger == -1)
00202       {
00203             return;
00204       }
00205 
00206       sPanicTriggerGridNo = gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bPanicTrigger ];
00207 
00208       uiPercentEnemiesKilled = (UINT32)( 100 * (UINT32)(gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled) / (UINT32)( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector + gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled ) );
00209       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubPanicTolerance[ bPanicTrigger ] > uiPercentEnemiesKilled )
00210       {
00211             // not yet... not yet
00212             return;
00213       }
00214 
00215       //bOldKeys = pSoldier->bHasKeys;    
00216       pSoldier->bHasKeys = (pSoldier->bHasKeys << 1) | 1;
00217 
00218       // if he can't get to a spot where he could get at the panic trigger
00219       iAPCost = AP_PULL_TRIGGER;
00220       if (pSoldier->sGridNo != sPanicTriggerGridNo)
00221       {
00222             iPathCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sPanicTriggerGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, RUNNING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
00223             if (iPathCost == 0)
00224             {
00225                   //pSoldier->bHasKeys = bOldKeys;
00226                   pSoldier->bHasKeys = (pSoldier->bHasKeys >> 1);
00227                   return;
00228             }
00229             iAPCost += iPathCost;
00230 
00231       }
00232 
00233       if ( iAPCost <= CalcActionPoints( pSoldier ) * 2)
00234       {
00235             // go!!!
00236             gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = pSoldier->ubID;
00237             return;
00238       }
00239       // else return keys to normal
00240       //pSoldier->bHasKeys = bOldKeys;
00241       pSoldier->bHasKeys = (pSoldier->bHasKeys >> 1);
00242 }

00245 INT8 PanicAI(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubCanMove)
00246 {
00247       BOOLEAN           fFoundRoute = FALSE;
00248       INT8              bSlot;
00249       INT32             iPathCost;
00250       INT8              bPanicTrigger;
00251       INT16             sPanicTriggerGridNo;
00252       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00253             STR16 tempstr;
00254       #endif
00255 
00256       // if there are panic bombs here
00257       if (gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags & PANIC_BOMBS_HERE)
00258       {
00259             // if enemy is holding a portable panic bomb detonator, he tries to use it
00260             bSlot = FindTrigger( pSoldier );
00261             if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
00262             {
00263                   //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00264                   // ACTIVATE DETONATOR: blow up sector's panic bombs
00265                   //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00266 
00267                   // if we have enough APs to activate it now
00268                   if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= AP_USE_REMOTE)
00269                   {
00270 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00271                         sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"TEST MSG: %s - ACTIVATING his DETONATOR!",pSoldier->name);
00272                         PopMessage(tempstr);
00273 #endif
00274                         // blow up all the PANIC bombs!
00275                         return(AI_ACTION_USE_DETONATOR);
00276                   }
00277                   else     // otherwise, wait a turn
00278                   {
00279                         pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00280                         return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00281                   }
00282             }
00283       }
00284 
00285       // no panic bombs, or no portable detonator
00286 
00287       // if there's a panic trigger here (DOESN'T MATTER IF ANY PANIC BOMBS EXIST!)
00288       if ( gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags & PANIC_TRIGGERS_HERE )
00289       {
00290             // Have WE been chosen to go after the trigger?
00291             if (pSoldier->ubID == gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne)
00292             {
00293                   bPanicTrigger = ClosestPanicTrigger( pSoldier );
00294                   if (bPanicTrigger == -1)
00295                   {
00296                         // augh!
00297                         return( -1 );
00298                   }
00299                   sPanicTriggerGridNo = gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bPanicTrigger ];
00300 
00301                   // if not standing on the panic trigger
00302                   if (pSoldier->sGridNo != sPanicTriggerGridNo)
00303                   {
00304                         // determine whether we can still get there 
00305                         iPathCost = PlotPath( pSoldier, sPanicTriggerGridNo, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, RUNNING, FALSE, FALSE, 0);
00306                         if (iPathCost != 0)
00307                         {
00308                               fFoundRoute = TRUE;
00309                         }                 
00310                   }
00311                   else
00312                   {
00313                         fFoundRoute = TRUE;
00314                   }
00315 
00316                   // if we managed to find an adjacent spot
00317                   if (fFoundRoute)
00318                   {
00319 
00320 /*
00321  *** COMMENTED OUT BECAUSE WE DON'T HAVE SUPPORT ROUTINES YET
00322 
00323        // make sure it's not in water (those triggers can't be pulled)
00324        if (Water(Terrain(gTacticalStatus.sHandGrid),Structure(gTacticalStatus.sHandGrid)))
00325       {
00326 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00327          PopMessage("BAD SCENARIO DESIGN: Enemies can't use this panic trigger!");
00328 #endif
00329          gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = NOBODY;   // strip him of his Chosen One status
00330        // don't bother replacing him either, the next won't have more luck!
00331          return(-1);
00332       }
00333 
00334       */
00335                         // if we are at that spot now
00336                         if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sPanicTriggerGridNo)
00337                         {
00338                               ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00339                               // PULL THE PANIC TRIGGER!
00340                               ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00341 
00342                               // and we have enough APs left to pull the trigger
00343                               if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= AP_PULL_TRIGGER)
00344                               {
00345                                     // blow up the all the PANIC bombs (or just the journal)
00346                                     pSoldier->usActionData = sPanicTriggerGridNo;
00347 
00348 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00349                                     sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"TEST MSG: %s - PULLS PANIC TRIGGER at grid %d",
00350                                     pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00351                                     PopMessage(tempstr);
00352 #endif
00353 
00354                                     return(AI_ACTION_PULL_TRIGGER);
00355                               }
00356                               else       // otherwise, wait a turn
00357                               {
00358                                     pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00359                                     return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00360                               }
00361                         }
00362                         else           // we are NOT at the HandGrid spot
00363                         {
00364                               // if we can move at least 1 square's worth
00365                               if (ubCanMove)
00366                               {
00367                                     // if we can get to the HandGrid spot to yank the trigger
00368                                     // animations don't allow trigger-pulling from water, so we won't!
00369                                     if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sPanicTriggerGridNo,ENSURE_PATH,NOWATER,0))
00370                                     {
00371                                           pSoldier->usActionData = sPanicTriggerGridNo;
00372                                           pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE;
00373 
00374 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00375                                           sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - GETTING CLOSER to PANIC TRIGGER at grid %d (Trigger at %d)", pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData,sPanicTriggerGridNo);
00376                                           AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00377 #endif
00378 
00379                                           return(AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER);
00380                                     }
00381                                     else       // Oh oh, the chosen one can't get to the trigger!
00382                                     {
00383 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00384                                           PopMessage("TEST MSG: Oh oh!  !legalDest - ChosenOne can't get to the trigger!");
00385 #endif
00386                                           gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = NOBODY;   // strip him of his Chosen One status
00387                                           MakeClosestEnemyChosenOne();     // and replace him!
00388                                     }
00389                               }
00390                               else         // can't move, wait 1 turn
00391                               {
00392                                     pSoldier->usActionData = NOWHERE;
00393                                     return(AI_ACTION_NONE);
00394                               }
00395                         }
00396                   }
00397                   else     // Oh oh, the chosen one can't get to the trigger!
00398                   {
00399 #ifdef TESTVERSION
00400                         PopMessage("TEST MSG: Oh oh!  !adjacentFound - ChosenOne can't get to the trigger!");
00401 #endif
00402                         gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = NOBODY; // strip him of his Chosen One status
00403                         MakeClosestEnemyChosenOne();   // and replace him!
00404                   }
00405             }
00406       }
00407 
00408       // no action decided
00409       return(-1);
00410 }
00411 
00412 void InitPanicSystem( void )
00413 {
00414       // start by assuming there is no panic bombs or triggers here
00415       gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne                        = NOBODY;
00416       FindPanicBombsAndTriggers();
00417 }
00418 
00419 INT8 ClosestPanicTrigger( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00420 {
00421       INT8        bLoop;
00422       INT16       sDistance;
00423       INT16       sClosestDistance = 1000;
00424       INT8        bClosestTrigger = -1;
00425       UINT32      uiPercentEnemiesKilled;
00426 
00427       uiPercentEnemiesKilled = (UINT32)( 100 * (UINT32)(gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled) / (UINT32)( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector + gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled ) );   
00428 
00429       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_PANIC_TRIGGERS; bLoop++ )
00430       {
00431             if ( gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bLoop ] != NOWHERE )
00432             {
00433             
00434                   if ( gTacticalStatus.ubPanicTolerance[ bLoop ] > uiPercentEnemiesKilled )
00435                   {
00436                         // not yet... not yet...
00437                         continue; // next trigger
00438                   }
00439 
00440                   // in Tixa
00441                   if ( gWorldSectorX == TIXA_SECTOR_X && gWorldSectorY == TIXA_SECTOR_Y )
00442                   {
00443                         // screen out everyone but the warden
00444                         if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != WARDEN )
00445                         {
00446                               break;
00447                         }
00448 
00449                         // screen out the second/later panic trigger if the first one hasn't been triggered
00450                         if ( bLoop > 0 && gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bLoop - 1 ] != NOWHERE )
00451                         {
00452                               break;
00453                         }
00454                   }
00455 
00456                   sDistance = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bLoop ] );
00457                   if (sDistance < sClosestDistance)
00458                   {
00459                         sClosestDistance = sDistance;
00460                         bClosestTrigger = bLoop;
00461                   }
00462             }
00463       }
00464 
00465       return( bClosestTrigger );
00466 }
00467 
00468 BOOLEAN NeedToRadioAboutPanicTrigger( void )
00469 {
00470       UINT32            uiPercentEnemiesKilled;
00471       INT8              bLoop;
00472 
00473       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags & PANIC_TRIGGERS_HERE) || gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne != NOBODY )
00474       {
00475             // already done!
00476             return( FALSE );
00477       }
00478 
00479       if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector == 0 )
00480       {
00481             return( FALSE );
00482       }
00483 
00484       if ( gWorldSectorX == TIXA_SECTOR_X && gWorldSectorY == TIXA_SECTOR_Y )
00485       {
00486             SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00487             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( WARDEN, FALSE );
00488             if ( !pSoldier || pSoldier->ubID == gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne )
00489             {
00490                   return( FALSE );
00491             }
00492       }
00493 
00494 
00495       uiPercentEnemiesKilled = (UINT32)( 100 * (UINT32)(gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled) / (UINT32)( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector + gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled ) );   
00496 
00497       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_PANIC_TRIGGERS; bLoop++ )
00498       {
00499             // if the bomb exists and its tolerance has been exceeded
00500             if ( (gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bLoop ] != NOWHERE) && ( uiPercentEnemiesKilled >= gTacticalStatus.ubPanicTolerance[ bLoop ] ) )
00501             {
00502                   return( TRUE );
00503             }
00504       }
00505 
00506       return( FALSE );
00507 }

00509 
00510 #define STAIRCASE_GRIDNO 12067
00511 #define STAIRCASE_DIRECTION 0
00512 
00513 INT8 HeadForTheStairCase( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00514 {
00515       UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO * pBasementInfo;
00516       
00517       pBasementInfo = FindUnderGroundSector( 3, MAP_ROW_P, 1 );
00518       if ( pBasementInfo && pBasementInfo->uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded != 0 && ( pBasementInfo->ubNumElites + pBasementInfo->ubNumTroops + pBasementInfo->ubNumAdmins ) < 5 )
00519       {
00520             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00521       }
00522 
00523       if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, STAIRCASE_GRIDNO ) < 2 )
00524       {
00525             return( AI_ACTION_TRAVERSE_DOWN );
00526       }
00527       else
00528       {
00529             if ( LegalNPCDestination( pSoldier, STAIRCASE_GRIDNO, ENSURE_PATH, WATEROK, 0 ) )
00530             {
00531                   pSoldier->usActionData = STAIRCASE_GRIDNO;
00532                   return( AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER );
00533             }
00534       }
00535       return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
00536 }
